description: A collection of circles in a tilted, lowercase-q-shaped formation, such that the line of the formation extends from the center of the picture toward the bottom left corner. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a large orangeish-red triangle in the center of the rounded part of the lowercase-q-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive

content: December 06, 2022. Have a bone to pick. #NYTVertex
